author: winnsterx
content: Hi! Researching about eip-4844 and I keep on seeing the range of 10-100x cheaper for rollups. I understand why it would be ~10x cheaper through the multidimensional fee market and lower data gas price. Rollup's L1 cost will go from 16 gas/byte to as little as 1 gas/byte. But where does this 100x figure come from?

author: winnsterx
content: In the initials parameters of eip 4844, MIN_DATA_GASPRICE is 1 https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844

author: pietjepuk
content: That's data gas though, not "normal" gas. They're two different markets with different prices.

author: winnsterx
content: I understand that difference. But rollups now post data on calldata which uses normal gas. with 4844, it will start using data gas, hence the 16x drop in fees
